notes: Spacious, upscale modern apartment with recessed LED ceiling lighting, hardwood and tile flooring, and large windows providing excellent natural light with mountain views. Very clean condition with minimal furnishings. For baby safety: the bedroom shows a small balcony with decorative iron railings that appear adequately spaced but would need childproofing; the glass coffee table has sharp corners. No stairs visible in this single-floor unit on the 15th floor of an 18-story building.
